kv18.6:6.3: Yā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:7.1: Paṭhamā jhānā dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:7.2: “yā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:7.13: nanu dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:7.17: Hañci dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:7.19: paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:8.3: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:8.5: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:9.8: Taññeva paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ jhānanti?
kv18.6:10.3: Yā dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:11.1: Dutiyā jhānā tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:11.2: “yā dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:11.13: nanu tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:11.17: Hañci tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:11.19: paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:12.3: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ vitakkavicāre ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:12.5: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ vitakkavicāre ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:13.8: Taññeva dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānanti?
kv18.6:14.3: Yā tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva catutthassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:15.1: Tatiyā jhānā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:15.2: “yā tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, sāva catutthassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:15.13: nanu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:15.17: Hañci catutthaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati … pe …
kv18.6:15.19: paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:16.3: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ pītiṃ ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:16.5: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ pītiṃ ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:17.8: Taññeva tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ catutthaṃ jhānanti?
